snippet: Representative Gregory W. Meeks, who had a little-known but significant relationship with Hugo Chávez, was part of a small United States delegation to Venezuela.
abstract: Rep Gregory W Meeks, New York Democrat who developed little-known but significant relationship with Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chavez, attends his funeral as part of small United States delegation.
lead_paragraph: Representative Gregory W. Meeks, who had a little-known but significant relationship with Hugo Chávez, was part of a small United States delegation to Venezuela.

headline.seo: Meeks, New York Congressman, Attends Chávez Funeral
